home.firstArticle: Making websites is not as hard as it might look. Any programming language is much much easier than any of human languages. And if you learned your language you can learn any programming language. This website looks quite hideous but it's only because I am very bad at design. Everybody can learn how to do it. Believe me. In 2020 I didn't know the difference between div and span. And today you can see my very own and very first website.

disclaimers.one: According to the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) (EU) 2016/679. Information contained on this website may be privileged or confidential and intended for the exclusive use of the original recipient. If you have visited this website by mistake, please leave the website immediately and delete it from your history.
disclaimers.two: Any information contained on this website are confidential and are intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed. If you have visited this website by mistake, you must not copy, distribute or disclose of the information it contains.
disclaimers.mobile: And this website is mobile friendly, give it a minute and visit it with your phone or tablet. Thanks.

gradientLine: this line represent the mastery of a skill from red (low) to green (high)

lightCv.thisIs: This is a light version of my CV,
lightCv.scanThis: or scan the QR code below.
lightCv.alert: If PDF rendered with errors please refresh the page and try again. Thank you.

tributes.goit text: I began with them. Of course they showed me just basics of HTML and CSS, but it was more than enough for me to get inspired and continue my education on my own.
tributes.goit subtitle: For introducing basics of HTML and CSS to me.
tributes.netninja text: His YouTube channel has some fantastic tutorials. I believe he really has a talent for teaching. I wish I had teachers like him in my school.
tributes.stack overflow text: They helped me learn, to understand and even find a clue when I was completely lost.
tributes.reddit text: Reddit is absolutely the best. Unfortunately some communities are not as big as on Stack Overflow, but people there are totally willing to help.
tributes.visitor subtitle: Of course you! My dear visitor!
tributes.visitor text: It wouldn't really make any sense if this page weren't seen by anybody else expect me? Isn't it? Thank you very much for visiting my website!
